elements.2211.03253_b01566829e96b5c4d149a76eceaa1: Robots have been brought to work close to humans in many scenarios
elements.2211.03253_d5eb7092f0caebb72be6835beee89: For coexistence and collaboration, robots should be safe and pleasant for humans to interact with
elements.2211.03253_55dd8cb169b0b4ea3001f20f19c38: To this end, the robots could be both physically soft with multimodal sensing/perception, so that the robots could have better awareness of the surrounding environment, as well as to respond properly to humans' action/intention
elements.2211.03253_47db5a89f9edd6717aa208dfd6b83: This paper introduces a novel soft robotic link, named
elements.2211.03253_80c9f734e08d71addc2a83d0baae2: , that possesses multiple sensing modes: tactile and proximity sensing, based on computer vision and a functional material
elements.2211.03253_82536e5810449e39c72e69cca7112: These modalities come from a layered structure of a soft transparent silicon skin, a polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) film, and reflective markers
elements.2211.03253_b1f0c91806a2bc2a32020470e7900: Here, the PDLC film can switch actively between the opaque and the transparent state, from which the tactile sensing and proximity sensing can be obtained by using cameras solely built inside the ProTac link
elements.2211.03253_6c6d0de7e69b48aaa92626514b727: In this paper, inference algorithms for tactile proximity perception are introduced
elements.2211.03253_ee9d26b45b493cc3fff7346f774df: Evaluation results of two sensing modalities demonstrated that, with a simple activation strategy, ProTac link could effectively perceive useful information from both approaching and in-contact obstacles
elements.2211.03253_57c04de6ae4148dfcd3b7c741f06a: The proposed sensing device is expected to bring in ultimate solutions for design of robots with softness, whole-body and multimodal sensing, and safety control strategies.
elements.2211.03253_96c3617d5f53684d239ccc79eeed1: Nowadays, human-friendly robots are required to operate out of the safety fence zone, collaborating with humans in complex or physically demanding work, as in the so-called human-robot interaction (HRI) scenarios
elements.2211.03253_a87c88b3b01d14daf1b6363a9d6a9: Regarding the essential nature of these foreseen applications, the robots should be able to not only react to possible collisions, but also handle both unavoidable and intentional physical contacts in a safe and purposed manner
elements.2211.03253_5f5c219d6351b9b37978582705b00: To potentially accomplish this, efforts should be made on the invention of novel robot components capable of passively reducing physical impacts based on compliant and lightweight structures
elements.2211.03253_fe3054c92bb6832f078deeb629307: In addition, multimodal perception provided by embedded sensing systems permits reliable recognition of surroundings contact as well as non-contact events, which benefits the development of motion planning and control regimes possible to react purposefully in the HRI scenarios
elements.2211.03253_5634007caa165148ce68f5cfc90a1: In this context, a soft sensory system endowed by both tactile and proximity sensations with a large coverage is essential.
elements.2211.03253_b58f7c487fa0a14e44cf27ed74c6a: Of sensing modalities, sense of touch offers a variety of tactile information from physical contacts, such as multiple applied forces, contact locations or complex touch patterns which are especially helpful in physical HRI (pHRI)
elements.2211.03253_24ad7c39335c65292c3986328a70b: In contrast to the success of small-scaled tactile sensors, the development of tactile sensors with large coverage has faced tremendous challenges
elements.2211.03253_3e155b2f880271adf1df6236b6ad0: Furthermore, most previous studies have concentrated on tactile sensing systems solely responding to physical touch and ignored touchless stimuli
elements.2211.03253_a7c24394650e833bbcc7f59e3b871: Proximity perception has recently attracted attention for its capability of closing perception gaps induced by occlusions and blind spots in vision
elements.2211.03253_bd02fa108d38bec3e66e65ee194c0: One approach to combine these two sensing abilities in one sensor is attaching multiple feature-related sensing components onto a printed circuit boards encapsulated in soft material
elements.2211.03253_5f9880c6046e56a1870ba515f819b: This system was successfully implemented in a variety of control frameworks and applications
elements.2211.03253_d07ba69d9c56b0ea62672b6ed87e0: thanks to its conformability and scalability
elements.2211.03253_57a7e6d515fc5fdd935ff7c6ac483: However, since the sensing components are spatially distributed over the surface interspersed by electronic components, this design paradigm expressed only low/coarse spatial resolution
elements.2211.03253_412a037d11322d82db08b581600fe: Not to mention the noise, since magnetic-
elements.2211.03253_adf1c23d54cf3eb92ad9d06f90269: tactile sensors often behaved differently with variation of material properties, which may cause difficulties in calibration and perception
elements.2211.03253_ee5075994081f21227caa24cb865e: The recent popularity of soft vision-based tactile sensors in the community is thanks to minimal wiring, high spatial resolution and low-cost
elements.2211.03253_22532c7b86188482810bd8e41f2cb: Specifically, cameras are employed to bring in details of soft skin's deformation under physical tactile stimuli, by capturing visual features such as: 1) markers
elements.2211.03253_83d668f2c8ce68742e50520b79d43: Then, skin deformation will be interpreted into tactile information, including contact location, force, object texture, and so on, with help of analytical approaches
elements.2211.03253_702a7ec506ea6e2467fd8167b0e4f: have been recently deployed to enrich and cheapen training data sources with minimum compromise in sensing efficiency
elements.2211.03253_1509f5119308d2a30cd623f1a603e: Notably, to complement the sense of touch, a multimodal visuotactile sensor, integrated with RGB and ToF (time-of-flight) cameras, has been developed to deliver dual tactile information and proximity depth data by leveraging a selectively transmissive soft membrane
elements.2211.03253_597615181696ef0bb36686f332627: Nevertheless, besides the fact that the scalability of this device to large sensing bodies is unclear, the price for the ToF camera, computation and energy cost to simultaneously process tactile and proximity images, are highly expensive.
elements.2211.03253_f218bd72aff105ec6077bf0948ae9: In this paper, we introduce a novel vision-based sensing robotic link with soft skin, named as
elements.2211.03253_f05f72075c647e8f63bb0392eae8a: , that possesses a large sensing area, featuring both the sense of touch at any locations on the body (
elements.2211.03253_8f987b8a1890f3b663e23f7c37b57: , tactile sensing), and the sense of distance (
elements.2211.03253_965ac7b9a1cc78786b2dc80268617: , proximity) of an object/obstacle to the vicinity of the skin
elements.2211.03253_55bfb566fe7b7a65c613334722452: Such functions are achieved by actively switching the skin optical property between
elements.2211.03253_92511286ff0efe83da5b119417926: (not able to be seen through) for the
elements.2211.03253_85f3383198dfb99159c0d1c0a1b20: (able to be seen through) for the
elements.2211.03253_bfe8b724ec8800185081fd3214ad1: In addition, we propose strategies for learning perceptions of respective sensing modalities, which can trigger the robot behavior toward safety in HRI scenarios
elements.2211.03253_e57b080cf68edc4a1664caacd7d00: In summary, the contributions of this paper are shown below:
elements.2211.03253_b244a6507fd6d4b00d30e31df197a: Design and fabrication of a soft vision-based dual-mode sensing link (
elements.2211.03253_335812e8495e1ff1285ed89a75211: ), possible for selective activation of either

elements.2211.03253_59833ba88c6fb1ef54b13e9e9d76c: Furthermore, the same internal RGB cameras are shared for both sensing modes.
elements.2211.03253_2e0c3a4495171712aadb78672e3ee: Proposal of methods to learn ProTac dual-mode perception, wherein the
elements.2211.03253_29eb8f8680e5ffcad95e71814fa70: mode measures the closest distance to external obstacles in an observed region by using monocular depth-map construction, meanwhile based on a deep learning model the
elements.2211.03253_4a2511b7bb31e3f7755e3e5cc1f51: mode is possible to estimate local contact depth.
elements.2211.03253_19e25cd068fb03a96e1667b27546e: Design Concept of Skin Transparency Switching
elements.2211.03253_e5553869b072911f92317517b34e9: We build ProTac upon the previous work on whole-arm tactile link (TacLink sensor)
elements.2211.03253_4f95d83f0d1b2699e3549aaf318cf: , and extend its capability for additional proximity perception
elements.2211.03253_051a1c632bb4bec05b095efddb8e5: To achieve such objective, we propose a novel combination of transparent silicone rubber and a thin flexible polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) film with attached markers
elements.2211.03253_7d176d95ad858c4c6c63f1b570761: In which, the PDLC film allows switching among two modes: opaque (darken mode) and transparent mode by applying an external voltage
elements.2211.03253_31a2224f5bc099f8b11e1398f94e1: Here, the switching time is approximately
elements.2211.03253_e842e08434afb3dbaf3877bb9303c: Therefore, the general working principle of the ProTac sensor link is as follows:
elements.2211.03253_c0f91d038e5cc7b2d9545a34e1d43: : When the PDLC film is in the transparent mode (see through), the two cameras inside the sensing link can see external objects that are close to the vicinity of the outer skin.
elements.2211.03253_0a2fcd47465540c55fe9709718dc1: : In contrast, the opaque (darken) mode of the PDLC film allows the two cameras to track the skin deformation through marker-featured images without external light interference, which enables the function of tactile or force sensing.

elements.2211.03253_b4c5ecf70ab3bdfbe7e1e32bf5fa6: , which means that we consider every

elements.2211.03253_014a973c8eb8ea0aa962bd5a1c24e: : The obtained results demonstrate the normalization of tactile inputs is necessary for improved sensing performance

elements.2211.03253_7e3f49abcfd80f7cc2d372df439ce: wallet, tape, hand, and human) from the corresponding transparent views (see Fig.
elements.2211.03253_938d5300711acef42382d6c1e7423: ), which is expressed via the obstacle masks
elements.2211.03253_83c98e6a2cbf3a8b31d387983c0b7: The accuracy of the calibrated closest distance estimated by the ProTac link is reported in Figure
elements.2211.03253_2a3dbdfc14ef3330415802d62c16a: , in which the estimation accuracy reached approximately
elements.2211.03253_46cc966df28d61ba66f77cbf8f0ba: mm in terms of RMSE (root mean squared error) metric averaged over a reliable range
elements.2211.03253_20339861082a9f04051f00834dcac: Despite the fact the upper sensing range could be further than
elements.2211.03253_f4a4bf30d4b2d513c43e507eec8e0: mm, the distance out of the reliable range caused a lot of uncertainties because the DNN model for depth estimation did not yet fine-tune for specific ProTac images
elements.2211.03253_223c67bc121104fad4573dc11d638: shows the log of measurement samples at the baseline distance
elements.2211.03253_2ea3352fe79ca74cc468f6298d363: mm, which yielded the measured distance mean
elements.2211.03253_2584a179498a50b4dcaadcfc94b08: : These preliminary results with the provided proximity sensing method promise a wider sensing range beyond
elements.2211.03253_d3df7fb6ed67e4c3d8fa57579429a: mm once fine-tuning the depth-map model is conducted
elements.2211.03253_eec485f70e5094e10a5e353900cb9: Also, the proposed method leaves room for the combination of two camera views in order to enlarge the sensing area, as well as for determining the approaching direction of nearby obstacles, which will be thoroughly examined in our future work.
elements.2211.03253_912130102c6c8e231bcf3ff4d3f62: This work introduces a novel design for a soft robotic link (ProTac) which features both tactile and proximity perception enabled by changing the transparency of the skin (the PDLC film in particular)
elements.2211.03253_6a2181b081e3e097af7f610d1cf01: The presented design and fabrication process can be extended to other vision-based tactile sensors in literature to date
elements.2211.03253_dd8b4e3be40277068821cdd467033: Furthermore, the evaluation results of system performance in both modes certify the feasibility and potential of this idea in real robotic arms
elements.2211.03253_799c0ac495c7f00640ec72b1b53b3: However, there are still some aspects that need further elaboration
elements.2211.03253_b8ed21cdbdfaf3f1c46a79d9ee08f: Firstly, the simulation model used to collect referenced tactile data for model training does not accurately reflect the behaviors of ProTac skin
elements.2211.03253_2ae15cfa00fbd95e997f631858cc6: The mechanical properties of the ProTac skin should be attributed to the coupling of the silicon-made soft layer and the PDLC film
elements.2211.03253_2457ba5649779f387d752962e111d: Secondly, the mechanical stability of the robot arm constituted by ProTac links in high-load operation is still questionable
elements.2211.03253_9979f9f70069afe4faf6632d8f5e4: An in-depth structural analysis for static and dynamic manner should be addressed in future work
elements.2211.03253_7b6b96848a71f598e9b5f36cc5632: Moreover, it is necessary to attain an optimal strategy for switching back and forth between two sensing modes to facilitate dexterous control and perception of the robot arm in different tasks
elements.2211.03253_9694f7e315575449e02ac03398c50: The effectiveness of multimodal perception in the creation of a safe and intelligent human-robot interaction should be further investigated.
